S/O. BALAKRISHNAN, AGED 29 YEARS, RESIDING AT THAVATHU HOUSE, PERINGANOOR AMSOM, PULOOKARA DESOM, THALASSERY TALUK, KANNUR DISTRICT-670 675 4 SANOOP N. S/O. BALAKRISHNAN, AGED 57 YEARS, RESIDING AT THAVATHU METHAL HOUSE, PERINGANOOR AMSOM, PULOOKARA DESOM, THALASSERY TALUK, KANNUR DISTRICT - 670 675 BY ADV. SRI.A.ARUNKUMAR SMT.V.SREEJA, PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bier 2019/KER/385 -3- Crl.MC.No. 8813 of 2018 ORDER The petitioners are accused in S.C.464/2015 on the files of the court below. The offences alleged are punishable under sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 323, 324 and 427 read with Section 149 of IPC. 2. The respondent Nos. 2 to 4 are the injured in the above case. The respondent Nos. 2 to 4 have filed separate affidavit stating that the matter has been settled by the parties and hence they have no further grievance against the petitioners. 3. Considering the nature of allegations, I am of the view that the settlement of the dispute will lead to peace and harmony in the locality. That apart, since the matter has been settled, there is no chance for culminating the trial in conviction. = ieee 2019/KER/385 -4- Cril.MC.No. 8813 of 2018 In view of the above reasons, I am of the view that it is only just and proper to quash the final report and further proceedings against the petitioners in S.C.No.464/2015 on the files of the court below in exercise of the inherent power under Section 482 of CrP.C. to meet the ends of justice. It is ordered accordingly. In the result, this Crl.M.C. stands allowed as above. Sd/- B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR JUDGE Nkr/04.1.2019 aie ay 2019/KER/385 -5- Cri.MC.No. 8813 of 2018 APPENDIX ANNEXURE AT CRIME NO.662/2014 OF CHOKLI POLICE STATION, KANNUR DISTRICT ANNEXURE ATII CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT ANNEXURE A ITI A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE RESPONDENT NO.2 ENDORSING- THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES ANNEXURE A IV A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE RESPONDENT NO.3 ENDORSING- THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES. ANNEXURE AV A TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE RESPONDENT NO.4 ENDORSING- THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES. RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS: NIL
